subject: Baseball
Steroids
Perjury
lead_paragraph: Phil Garner, Roger Clemens’s manager for two and a half years with the Houston Astros, became the latest witness to speak glowingly of Clemens at his federal perjury trial in Washington.
snippet: Phil Garner, Roger Clemens’s manager for two and a half years with the Houston Astros, became the latest witness to speak glowingly of Clemens at his federal perjury trial in Washington.
